name: Reech and Hait
description:
REECH & HAIT

…tells the adventure of two friends,
Reech the gecko, and Hait the monkey, 
trying to find their way to a new home.

On their quest, they will encounter strange ancient mechanisms in 
a long-forgotten cavern and must combine their unique strengths to solve riddles.

This game is an atmospheric puzzle-platformer for two players in which you have to work together to help the duo find their way out!

Reech, the Gecko

Reech is cunning, agile, and a little bit afraid of the dark, although he would never admit it. Being a gecko, his sticky feet allow him to safely walk on smooth ceilings and reach otherwise inaccessible areas. He also can throw his tail like a boomerang, and since it always returns to him, his friend Hait can grab onto it, to cross steep chasms.

Hait, the Monkey

Hait is always up for a new adventure, especially when bananas are waiting at the end! His healthy diet was all worth the while - Hait's strength allows him to catapult his partner Reech high up into the air, hoping for his buddy to land on steady ground. Besides that, Hait enjoys working out by climbing vines and pushing large boulders.

Gameplay Preview Controls

      GAME ONLY PLAYABLE WITH AT MOST ONE KEYBOARD OR
      TWO XBOX CONTROLLERS
